p: A Rietveld fitting is done to refine the lattice and atomic positions. We choose to fit the data at 464 K, and the result in Fig. 4 reveals three different phases: the cubic ε-Al 60Sm 11, fcc-Al and the tetragonal η-Al 41Sm 5, which constitute ~33.3, 38.3, and 28.4 wt.%, respectively. Table 1 shows the lattice parameters and atomic coordinates of the η-Al 41Sm 5 phase, given by both DFT calculations and the Rietveld analysis.
